document.full_text: "buck" -- a documentary about the real-life "horse whisperer" and the cowboy trainer dan (buck) brannaman -- has been generating some buzz since its debut at the sundance film festival in january, where it won the audience award for its first-time director, cindy meehl.
document.title: the rail: hearing the voice of the horse whisperer
lines_and_colors: "buck" -- a documentary about the real-life "horse whisperer" and the cowboy trainer dan (buck) brannaman -- has been generating some buzz since its debut at the sundance film festival in january, where it won the audience award for its first-time director, cindy meehl.
